name: please dont let go.
description:
ive been like this for a while now. i just need you to hold on. don't let go. there are others who have tried but everybody ends up stopping. all you have to do is hold me. thats all im asking of you. can you?

just hold on for as long as you can. dont worry ill count how long youve been here.

you can see how long others stayed. do better than them. stay with me. please.

ill be here to comfort you. you can comfort me. we can stay here together. ill even play you music.

please...
